title: CM Sindh briefs PM on law and order
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 18 (APP): Sindh Chief Minister Syed Murad Ali Shah Wednesday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and briefed him over the administrative and law and order situation in the province.
The prime minister was also briefed over the recent terrorist incidents in Karachi.
The prime minister said miscreants would not be allowed to vitiate the law and order situation in Karachi.
Both the leaders agreed that the federal and provincial governments would jointly work for the progress and development of Karachi.
